website_summaries.verdict: Choose if you need an effective and easy-to-use fertilizer for indoor plants and small gardens, or if you don't mind the cost you will incur if you need to purchase numerous bottles.
pros: A small package with big potential – 7 drops per quart of water is packed with micro-nutrients that works on indoor and outdoor plants
Users have reported exceptional results when used on seedlings
cons: You may have to purchase several bottles if you have a lot of plants to fertilize

customer_reviews.title: It's basically plant steroids
customer_reviews.text: A green-thumbed friend gave me a bottle of this years ago; I've never stopped using it and all my indoor plants are thriving. I have poinsettias that are 5 years old and still "bloom" red. I have spider plants that keep multiplying faster than I can give them away. I have snake plants ("mother-in-law's tongue") that I have had to split and repot three times now. I even use this for my cactus (although they do make a separate formula for cacti) and they have also flourished. I use this once a week during watering, year round.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Plants grow like crazy!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for over 20 yrs and it is the best you can get. So simple to put into water and use once a month especially for indoor plants. Everyone always tells me I have a green thumb - honestly I don't but my plants don't look like it. Love the stuff...
customer_reviews.author: FOB_Safe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product keeps the flowers blooming!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent plant food just about anything that I put it on has bloomed incredibly the flowers are twice the size and a flowering with much more then previously when I just used water mixed with a powdered plant food. I've even used it on my plants outside. Let's say everything coming up roses!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meco

customer_reviews.title: Very effective & easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this plant food for many, many years. It's easy to use with the eye-dropper built into the top. The results are fantastic. My houseplants look wonderful and they bloom profusely. My mother recommended this product and I've used it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: M. Campi

customer_reviews.title: It works miracles
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for at least twenty years, if not longer. Nothing feeds plants better. They are all greener, flower more often indoors and I even once had a plant that had literally died. Nothing but a withered shell of itself. I tried with Schultz and it came back. I put a few drops into my watering can each week when I water.
customer_reviews.author: TomD

customer_reviews.title: Schultz alway does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product cheaper at my local nursery but that aside this product works. I feed my garden and the next day my plants look better but for $ 18.00 you should get more for your buck. I love the Schultz plant food but these bottles are more market for house plants or a few pots. Using in my potted garden used up an entire bottle but it great,reliable and easy to use. My plants thank you. Veneita
customer_reviews.author: veneita porter

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: This was on a list of recommended plant foods for Bonsai and house plants - first - is really easy - figure the number of drops and there ya go... Pretty large container so a pretty good value... Check the plant's needs but otherwise, definitely overall positive.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: So happy to find this.
customer_reviews.text: When I needed more Schultz All Purpose plant food, I looked everywhere, but couldn't find it. I was so happy to finally find that it's still available. My mother used it and so have I for over 50 years! I'll be stocking up when I run out again!
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I used this product years ago and was good for my plants. They really need someone to check the product before shipping. The bottles had leaked and if they weren't wrapped in plastic it would have been a bigger mess than it was.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hart

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good with this plant food. But, how can you go wrong with Schultz -- they have been at it forever. I also use the Schultz African Violet food and my violets are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Indoor plants thrive
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years. I use a diluted amount in rainwater put in gallon jugs to water my indoor plants throughout the year. Beautiful thriving plants all year long.
customer_reviews.author: MissPris

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose plant food.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this plant food for many years and the plants grow well with it. Now, for the first time in 2decades I need more and will buy only the best.
customer_reviews.author: evilpeekey

customer_reviews.title: Really bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The product came broken and leaked all over my desk, after I opened the plastic package. What a mess. It smells like sulfur, and now my office stinks to high heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Frank K. Gutfrucht

customer_reviews.title: Schulz all purpose plant food
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this product for my fern and since using it, the fern has grown huge. I've also started using this on other plants and found it most satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Just add to water when doing plant care. No noticeable odor, which great for use on houseplants.
customer_reviews.author: Keri McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Feeds without burning
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the same fertilizer as my mother was using a decade ago.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Since using this, my house plants have been flourishing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: VLB

customer_reviews.title: Spring burst!
customer_reviews.text: My plants are doing incredibly well since I started using this plant food. Easy to add to plant with the dropper.
customer_reviews.author: Michele A Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: So Happy to Have Found This Again!
customer_reviews.text: I used Schultz All Purpose Plant Food for many years with wonderful results. When I wasn't able to find it in stores, I tried a number of other plant foods to the detriment of my plants. I was thrilled to find this through Amazon and my plants are once again thriving!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My plants have thrived using this to feed them. It is very easy to use so it is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry A. Karaim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use  and no danger of over fertilizing.
customer_reviews.text: Have used for years and have no complaints about this product. If you could see my house plants you could tell it works.
customer_reviews.author: Tecumseh

customer_reviews.title: Significant Growth
customer_reviews.text: I have seen significant growth in all my plants after just one month! Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Chen

customer_reviews.title: poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The bottles arrived in boxes that were wet and much of the liquid had leaked out. That is the only reason for 2 stars since I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: ShutterbugS

customer_reviews.title: Best Plant Food
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my indoor & outdoor plants. The ease of use (just 7 drops) and the results (which are great) speak for themselves! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BEFace

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my houseplants which flourish after a short while after use. I have used it for years with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Uriarte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and I have indoor plants that are over 40 years old
customer_reviews.author: STFU&DANCE123

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet, but neither bottle was tightly closed and both leaked
customer_reviews.author: kathleen mangieri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My indoor and outdoor plants are responding very well to this product!
customer_reviews.author: Teemanarie

customer_reviews.title: Mo's review
customer_reviews.text: Best indoor plant fertilizer. Bedn using it for 15 years and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dillow

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This formula really helps my house plants. Great product that I've used for years.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. McGrue

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years. My ivy grows like a jungle, all around the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This has always worked well
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for more years than I can even remember with very good results.
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My plants speak quite well of this product and ask that I put forward their highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Craig & Suzanne Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: I like this plant food.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little bottles of liquid plant food. My plants seem to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christa A Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought them for my mom's plants. She loves using them b/c they help her plants stay healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping.  Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Very quick delivery! Item was exactly as described! Dependable seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and my plants are thriving
customer_reviews.text: This has always been my go to plant food and it's difficult to find at any stores now! So easy to use and my plants are thriving!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Flowers

customer_reviews.title: The Price is Right!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time. Have happy, healthy indoor plants!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Q

customer_reviews.title: Works the Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the only plant food I use for my house plants and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect amount shipped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a single bottle not a double but decided to keep as I figured I would use it at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: House plants are happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. My house plants are happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Damage in Delivery
customer_reviews.text: One of the two opened enroute, such that 1/2 of one bottle was lost in delivery.
customer_reviews.author: J Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love Schultz Plant Food! It helps my plants to flourush!
customer_reviews.author: papula

customer_reviews.title: very convenient
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I need. I have used Schultz plant food before. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Steven DiStefano

customer_reviews.title: and it's the best. Houseplants thrive
customer_reviews.text: Been using Schultz for years, and it's the best. Houseplants thrive. I didn't buy any last year because the price went up to $20 a bottle. Guess the new owner wanted to see what would stick. So glad price didn't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I like that it provides, with ease, what my potted plants need to keep them happy!$
customer_reviews.author: Don Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use and works very well
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years. It's easy to use and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The best fertilizer!!! You can use it each time you water, and will make your plants & flowers thrive. I have been using it for years & would not use any thing else!
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Schultz is the absolute best for houseplants. Easy to use. I've relied on it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: My plants love when I put this in the water and feed them
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can feed my plants and water them at the same time. They thank me every day!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Kreienkamp

customer_reviews.title: Great for my plants
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this brand for plants all my life and it’s what my mother used. Easy to use and keeps my plants healthy!
customer_reviews.author: DD philly

product_meta.title: Schultz All Purpose 10-15-10 Plant Food Plus, 4-Ounce [2- Pack]
feature_bullets: This is a set of 2 Schultz All Purpose 10-15-10 Plant Food Plus, 4-Ounce
For all Indoor and Outdoor Plants
Just 7 drops every time you water
Excellent for transplanting, repotting and rooting.
